comments: looks like we just got a new religion.
I'm sure he'll just have a normal life.

author: Gordon Ramsay
comments: Gordon Ramsay: You'll never go to McDonalds again after eating this.
ingredients: Sirloin, onion, ketchup, garlic, tabasco, mustard.
instructions: Combine all ingredients. Form into patties, cook as desired.
title: Best hamburguer you'll ever have

author: Fernando Pessoa
description: A quick thought about the role wind plays in my life.
text: Às vezes ouço passar o vento; e só de ouvir o vento passar, vale a pena ter nascido.
title: Wind

author: Fernando Pessoa
description: Had this while I was in the toilet, not bad.
text: O poeta é um fingidor. Finge tão completamente Que chega a fingir que é dor A dor que deveras sente.
title: Autopsychography

author: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa
comments: Octávio Maia: Se for comida à discrição conta comigo!
description: Dinner at the National Pantheon celebrating my 2nd year as President.
text: Come have fun with us and enjoy a great meal!
title: 2 years as President!
